BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 150159Z FEB
   BY M/V NPS VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   23-53.03S 041-31.37W, 23-57.57S 041-42.49W,
   24-50.01S 041-14.26W, 24-43.55S 041-01.29W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 150259Z FEB.
